title: Gabber: #HCI4DC
name: there
main-content: The Gabber you helped create needs your consent in order for this to be publicly available, and can listen to this by clicking the button below. There is an option to share the original audio, a text-only, anonymized version, or to not share the audio altogether.
sub-content: Thank you for capturing and sharing your experiences. Your contributions will be used to improve your experience and future students of digital civics.
